content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you today? Are you experiencing an issue with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC?
Hi! I need a plumber – my sink is leaking pretty badly.
I’m sorry to hear about your leaking sink. May I please have your name to get started with scheduling your plumbing service?
Thank you, Mark! Can you please provide the address where you need the plumbing service?
It’s 742 Evergreen, um, actually…wait, or was it Evergreen Terrace? Hmm.
Could you please confirm the full street address including the house number and city? This will help ensure our technician reaches you without any issues.
Uh, I think it’s 742 Evergreen Avenue. Or is it Street? Sorry, I keep mixing it up.
Thank you! Could you clarify if it’s 742 Evergreen Avenue, Street, or Terrace? If you can include your city as well, that would be helpful.
Sorry, I'm totally blanking. Let me check some mail and get back to you.
No problem! I'll pause here. If you could provide your complete address when you're ready, I’ll get things moving as quickly as possible.
reason: Customer unable to provide valid address. Needs operator assistance.

content: Hi Mark, this is Angela from XYZ Home Services. I can help you get scheduled. If you’re able, can you send me a photo of a piece of mail or anything handy that shows your full address, or just the city you live in? We’ll make sure not to share your info, just want to get the right technician to your home.
